contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Orvelte | settlement_type = Village | other_name = <!-- if different from name --> | native_name = <!-- if different from name --> | native_name_lang = nl | image_skyline = Dorpsgezicht Orvelte.jpg | image_alt = | image_caption = Dorpsgezicht van Orvelte | image_flag = | image_shield = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = LocatieMidden-Drenthe.png | map_caption = | image_map1 = Map NL - Midden-Drenthe - Orvelte.png | map_caption1 = The village (dark red) and the statistical district (light green) of Orvelte in the municipality of Midden-Drenthe. | pushpin_map = <!-- Netherlands --> | pushpin_label_position = left | pushpin_map_caption = Location in the Netherlands | subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] | subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of the Netherlands|Province]] | subdivision_name1 = Drenthe | subdivision_type2 = [[List of municipalities of the Netherlands|Municipality]] | subdivision_name2 = Midden-Drenthe | leader_title = | leader_name = | leader_party = | latd = 52|latm = 50|lats = 37|latNS = N | longd= 6|longm = 39|longs= 35|longEW= E | coordinates_region = NL | coordinates_type = region:NL_type:city(230) | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_footnotes = | elevation_m = | elevation_min_m = | elevation_max_m = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | established_title = | established_date = | population_footnotes = <!-- for references: use <ref> tags --> | population_total = 230 | population_as_of = 2007 <ref>[http://statline.cbs.nl/StatWeb/publication/?VW=T&DM=SLNL&PA=70904NED&D1=9&D2=13719-13721&D3=(l-11)-l&HD=080420-1435&HDR=T&STB=G1,G2 CBS Statline]</ref> | population_demonym = | population_note = | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] | utc_offset_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = [[List of postal codes in the Netherlands|Postal code]] | postal_code = | area_code_type = [[Telephone numbers in the Netherlands|Dialing code]] | area_code = | website = | footnotes = }} '''Orvelte''' is a village in the [[Netherlands|Dutch]] province of [[Drenthe]]. It is a part of the municipality of [[Midden-Drenthe]], and lies about 18 km northeast of [[Hoogeveen]]. Orvelte presents itself as a [[museum]] village. There is a [[saw mill]], a [[blacksmith]] and a [[wooden shoe]] maker, all open to the public. In Orvelte live less than a 100 people. A number of events are held throughout the year featuring traditional Dutch activities. The statistical area "Orvelte", which also can include the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 220.<ref name="CBS2">Statistics Netherlands (CBS), [http://statline.cbs.nl/ ''Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005'']. As of 1 January 2005.</ref> ==References== <references/> {{Midden-Drenthe town}} [[Category:Museums in Drenthe]] [[Category:Populated places in Drenthe]] [[Category:Open air museums in the Netherlands]] {{Drenthe-geo-stub}}
